name: Port Boat Cleaning Rebuild & Dress Up Game For Children
name_original: Port Boat Cleaning Rebuild & Dress Up Game For Children
description:
Hey Ship Washing and decorate is a free washing game .You have the choose number of ship to wash and cleaning up. Kids are going to have ultimate fun yet learning experience.

Select your favourite ship and start washing and cleaning it up using different interesting auto spa car wash tools available. Use soap, foam, sponge, water gun etc to remove the dirt & mud from the copter so it can shine like a diamond.

ship Wash Salon & Design is a cool game will super ship of different colours, you have a lot options available to clean them up and design them with your favourite ship.You can also decorate your boat using different stickers and tattoos.. Enjoy This Funny and Crazy Game For Kids..
